page.title: 05Employment in the D-Block
page.content: Much of the{employment}in the area is connected with farming.Apart from the farm-owners there are some self- employed farmers who help with relief milking,lambing,harvesting,hedge- laying etc. Neither village has any industry or employment other than{agriculture,}so people must commute to nearby towns or cities for jobs.The majority of{ {commuters}travel to Leicester,but some work in Market Harborough,Kibworth or Fleckney.A few travel further to London,Birmingham,Rugby and Corby.People are mostly employed in the{service industries}in business and management. There is no public transport in the area,so everyone travels to work by car.Many of the wives work too,full- time or part-time.This is an area of low unemployment at this time.
